synopsis.text:
Will Tokishima Gen, an ordinary high school student turned legendary Mapman, embark on an extraordinary journey across the galaxy to uncover the elusive treasure known as the 'Flowing Light'? As the last surviving member of the Nomad Star tribe, Gen possesses the unique ability to retrieve the hidden pieces of the starmap, a map that reveals the path to this invaluable treasure.

Lipumira, a living starship, discovers Gen in Tokyo and persuades him to join her quest to find the remaining pieces of the starmap. However, Gen's decision to leave Earth is complicated by his girlfriend's determination to join the adventure. As they journey through space, Lipumira's sisters emerge as formidable adversaries, intent on stopping them at any cost.

Will Gen and Lipumira succeed in their mission, or will they fall prey to the sinister plans of Lipumira's sisters? Join them on this thrilling adventure to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
